thread.title: Sally Kohn accuses Kurt Schlichter of ‘blind hatred’ of Muslims, but one photo proves she’s wrong
thread.title_full: Sally Kohn accuses Kurt Schlichter of ‘blind hatred’ of Muslims, but one photo proves she’s wrong

author: Greg P.
title: Sally Kohn accuses Kurt Schlichter of ‘blind hatred’ of Muslims, but one photo proves she’s wrong
text:
— Pradheep Shanker MD (@Neoavatara) January 25, 2017 
Townhall columnist Kurt Schlichter and Sally Kohn have been sparring back and forth for the past few days, but it probably didn’t end the way Sally thought it would. 
It all started with this tweet from Kurt, responding to something she had written last year: Remember, leftists like @sallykohn will always – always -side with our enemies. 
— Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) January 24, 2017 
Which led to this back-and-forth: Correction: A Muslim leader FIGHTING FOR WOMEN'S RIGHTS AND LGBT RIGHTS AND PEACE AND NON-VIOLENCE is called an ALLY! #IMarchWithLinda https://t.co/LC8Vlrl1xM 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) January 24, 2017 No, I worked with Muslim allies. She is an Islamic fanatic and your best case scenario with her is she kills you last. @sallykohn 
— Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) January 24, 2017 
Uh-oh, Sally. This might be a good time to check his bio to see what else Kurt did for a living… I feel sad for you and everyone who thinks like you. It must be hard having your heart filled with so much blind hatred. https://t.co/Tyso6rrMQw 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) January 24, 2017 
“Blind hatred, she says.” And she fell into the trap: Hi @sallykohn . Here's me showing my "blind hatred" while deployed away from my family protecting Muslims from genocide. Where's your pic? pic.twitter.com/JRwUTxjE0q 
— Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) January 25, 2017 
Over to you, Sally: When have you helped stop a genocide? Trending
